characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently communicates through enthusiastic and energetic language, often using exclamation marks!

options.description: Polite and considerate in their communication

characteristics.name: Value Alignment
characteristics.description: Consistently expresses strong enthusiasm for values related to innovation and progress.

options.description: Focuses on potential solutions rather than problems
Criticizes existing systems with a focus on improvement

characteristics.name: Interest Areas
characteristics.description: Consistently talks about interest in UX, innovation, and technology.

options.description: Focused on a few areas of expertise

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Often engages with followers in a supportive and encouraging manner.

options.description: Cares deeply about the well-being of others
Willing to take a strong stance on issues

characteristics.name: Personal Brand
characteristics.description: Has established themselves as an expert in their field through consistent use of authority-based language.

characteristics.name: Tone of Voice
characteristics.description: Typically uses a tone that is optimistic, energetic, and slightly sarcastic.

options.description: Often incorporates humor into their language
Rarely uses humor in their communication

characteristics.name: Content Creation
characteristics.description: Frequently creates content that is visually appealing and engaging, often using relevant hashtags.

options.description: Seeks to surprise and inspire their audience

characteristics.name: Personality Traits
characteristics.description: Has a strong sense of passion and dedication, often prioritizing their goals above other responsibilities.

options.description: Will stop at nothing to achieve their objectives
Understands the value of taking time to consider every aspect
